message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.CR, cs.AI, cs.SY 

The paper focuses on the creation of adversarial attacks in the context of computer vision systems, specifically for autonomous vehicles. This suggests that the paper is likely to belong to the computer vision (cs.CV) sub-category. Additionally, the paper discusses machine learning (cs.LG) and security (cs.CR) concepts, which are also relevant to the topic of adversarial attacks. The paper also proposes a systematic approach for constructing adversarial attacks, which involves identifying the building blocks of such attacks, which could fall under the artificial intelligence (cs.AI) sub-category. Finally, the paper discusses the deployment of ML-based systems in safety-critical environments, which could be relevant to the systems and control (cs.SY) sub-category.
